input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Filename of input image (usually a tissue/air segmentation)

zero_order_x.title: Zeroth-order x-gradient
zero_order_x.description: Value for zeroth-order x-gradient field (per mm); default=0

zero_order_y.title: Zeroth-order y-gradient
zero_order_y.description: Value for zeroth-order y-gradient field (per mm); default=0

zero_order_z.title: Zeroth-order z-gradient
zero_order_z.description: Value for zeroth-order z-gradient field (per mm); default=0

b0_x.title: Zeroth-order B0 x-component
b0_x.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (x-component); default=0

b0_y.title: Zeroth-order B0 y-component
b0_y.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (y-component); default=0

b0_z.title: Zeroth-order B0 z-component
b0_z.description: Value for zeroth-order B0 field (z-component); default=1

chi0.title: Susceptibility of air
chi0.description: Value for susceptibility of air; default=+4e-7

xyz_flag.title: XYZ field components flag
xyz_flag.description: Calculate and save all 3 field components (i.e. x,y,z)

extend_boundary.title: Boundary extension proportion
extend_boundary.description: Relative proportion to extend voxels at boundary; default=1

direct_conv.title: Direct convolution flag
direct_conv.description: Use direct (image space) convolution, not FFT
